DOC.detailed_description: Detailed Summary 1 . PURPOSE : Older adult diabetes faint frequently , due impairment cardiovascular control mechanism ( arterial baroreceptor function , autonomic nervous system function cerebral autoregulation ) prevent syncope . The purpose study examine ability home base walk program reverse impairment . 2 . HYPOTHESES : ) A home-based walking program improve compensatory cardiovascular response prevent syncope old adult Type 2 diabetes . A moderate , regular exercise program : - increase arterial baroreflex sensitivity - increase heart rate variability ( marker autonomic nervous system function ) - decrease cerebrovascular resistance - improve cerebral autoregulation upright tilt . b ) There relationship improvement compensatory cardiovascular response regular exercise . c ) Design practicable training prescription use research setting .
